mapper.select: select sum(bru_s2VaccineUse) bru_s2VaccineUse, sum(bru_s2NiuImmuneAmount) bru_s2NiuImmuneAmount, sum(bru_s2SheepImmuneAmount) bru_s2SheepImmuneAmount, sum(bru_m5VaccineUse) bru_m5VaccineUse, sum(bru_m5NiuImmuneAmount) bru_m5NiuImmuneAmount, sum(bru_m5SheepImmuneAmount) bru_m5SheepImmuneAmount, sum(bru_a19VaccineUse) bru_a19VaccineUse, sum(bru_a19NiuImmuneAmount) bru_a19NiuImmuneAmount, sum(bru_a19SheepImmuneAmount) bru_a19SheepImmuneAmount from animal_disease.b_wbrucellosis where bru_regionCode=#{regionCode} AND bru_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime}

select t1.Liv_regionCode as bru_regionCode ,t1.Liv_regionName as bed_regionName,t2.* from (select Liv_regionCode,Liv_regionName from animal_disease.b_wlivestockinout GROUP by Liv_regionCode,Liv_regionName ) as t1 LEFT JOIN ( select bru_regionCode, sum(bru_s2VaccineUse) bru_s2VaccineUse, sum(bru_s2NiuImmuneAmount) bru_s2NiuImmuneAmount, sum(bru_s2SheepImmuneAmount) bru_s2SheepImmuneAmount, sum(bru_m5VaccineUse) bru_m5VaccineUse, sum(bru_m5NiuImmuneAmount) bru_m5NiuImmuneAmount, sum(bru_m5SheepImmuneAmount) bru_m5SheepImmuneAmount, sum(bru_a19VaccineUse) bru_a19VaccineUse, sum(bru_a19NiuImmuneAmount) bru_a19NiuImmuneAmount, sum(bru_a19SheepImmuneAmount) bru_a19SheepImmuneAmount from animal_disease.b_wbrucellosis where bru_date BETWEEN #{beginTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP by bru_regionCode ) as t2 on t1.Liv_regionCode=t2.bru_regionCode ORDER by t1.Liv_regionCode
